text: Nagrama zamasami'noa kasegea ame hu'za zamefi hunemi'za, kaza osu anumzana golire kre ze'ze hute'za bulimakao afu'mofo amema'a tro huntene'za, ana zante zamarena re'za mono hunente'za Kresramana vunente'za amanage hu'naze, Israeli vahe'mota ama anumzantimo Isipitira tamavre fegiteno e'ne hu'za hu'naze.
